title: UK IT Market Analysis - ITJobsWatch Data
subtitle: Comprehensive UK IT job market data from ITJobsWatch including trends, salaries, and technology adoption
description:
This dataset contains scraped and analyzed data from ITJobsWatch, providing insights into the UK IT job market. It includes:

## Data Sources
- **ITJobsWatch Charts**: Computer vision processed trend charts for various technologies and job titles
- **Job Listings**: Scraped job postings with location, salary, and skill requirements
- **Market Share Data**: Historical trends for programming languages, cloud platforms, and job categories

## Key Features
- Time series data for technology adoption trends (2019-2025)
- Salary distributions by role and location
- Technology stack popularity rankings
- London-specific market analysis
- Sector-specific technology trends (Finance, Healthcare, etc.)

## Data Format
- CSV files for tabular data
- JSON files for structured metadata
- WebP/PNG images of original charts
- Processed trend data with normalized values

## Use Cases
- Technology trend analysis
- Salary benchmarking
- Skills gap identification
- Market demand forecasting
- Career planning insights
